name: Friday Night Funkin but if you miss a note, the game becomes unplayable
name_original: Friday Night Funkin but if you miss a note, the game becomes unplayable
description:
Have you always been missing notes when you play Friday Night Funkin? Have you ever wanted to make your pain even MORE painful? Do you like slowly dying on the inside? Well I've got just the mod for you! If you miss a note now, the game just becomes unplayable and you have to refresh the page!

Now...

SUFFER.

Kade Engine by KadeDev

DISCLAIMER: I don't know why, but the third song in every week disappeared in Story Mode. Just realized now but I'm gonna keep because it adds to the pain lol
